ECR > 1MVA Already connected.aggregation: SUM of Already connected Registered Capacity (MW) WHERE Connection Status = "Connected" OR blank/null

ECR > 1MVA Accepted to connect.aggregation: SUM of Accepted to Connect Registered Capacity (MW) WHERE Connection Status = "Accepted to Connect" OR blank/null

ECR < 1MVA Already connected.aggregation: SUM of Already connected Registered Capacity (MW) WHERE Connection Status = "Connected" OR blank/null

ECR < 1MVA Accepted to connect.aggregation: SUM of Accepted to Connect Registered Capacity (MW) WHERE Connection Status = "Accepted to Connect" OR blank/null
